attributes.action: Change the standard working week to 4 working days
attributes.additional_details:
It's a proven fact this provides multiple benefits as these 4 day work weeks have been tested by Microsoft in Japan 

Also 250 staff at Perpetual Guardian tookpart in this trial with a 8 hour 4 day work week but getting paid for 5. Offices around the country reported lower stress levels, higher levels of job satisfaction and an improved sense of work-life. 

Perpetual Guardian adopted 4 day work week as the norm due to the renown success.
attributes.background:
Encourage UK Buisness to take on a 4 day work week.
 Microsoft’s 4-day work week test in Japan boosts productivity by 40%. 

Japan Is however a extremely overworked country but doing this not only improved work rates but also improved the physical and mental wellbeing of all staff who took part.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  Working hours are a matter for individual employers.

You could start a petition calling for the Government to require 3 days off per working week, if that's somnething you'd like to see happen.
